programme.title: The 90s: Cinemas Greatest Decade
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity film fans go back to the 90s to celebrate some of the decades greatest films, from classic comedies to epic blockbusters.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Were the Millers
programme.desc: Indebted to a big-time drug lord, a pot dealer travels to Mexico with a fake family and a camper to pick up a large shipment and smuggle it into the U.S.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Anyone but You
programme.desc: Despite having an amazing first date, Bea and Bens initial attraction quickly turns sour. When they unexpectedly find themselves at a destination wedding in Australia, the pair pretend to be the perfect couple to keep up appearances.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Empire Waist
programme.desc: Lenore is a plus-sized teenager who gets forced into the spotlight when her classmate discovers her talent for fashion. However, the fears of her image-conscious mother and Lenores own insecurities prevent her from wearing her own designs.

programme.title: Empire Waist
programme.desc: Lenore is a plus-sized teenager who gets forced into the spotlight when her classmate discovers her talent for fashion. However, the fears of her image-conscious mother and Lenores own insecurities prevent her from wearing her own designs.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: Young at Heart
programme.desc: Laurie Tuttle and Barney Sloan fall in love despite the presence of her fiance, Alex Burke. Sloan is a musician called in to score a comedy Burke is writing who steals Tuttles heart, but since she has two equally attractive sisters, a happy ending is guaranteed.

programme.title: Chuck Chuck Baby
programme.desc: Helen lives with her ex-husband, his 20-year-old girlfriend, their new baby and his dying mother. Her dreary life is interrupted when her schoolgirl crush arrives back in town.

programme.title: The Convert
programme.desc: A lay preachers violent past is drawn into question and his faith tested as he becomes caught up in a bloody war between Maori tribes after arriving at a British settlement in the 1830s.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: I Used to Be Funny
programme.desc: Comedian Sam struggles with PTSD, and considers joining the search for a missing teenage girl.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Bernard Jordan, a World War II veteran, sneaks out of his care home to attend the 70th anniversary commemoration of the D-Day landings in Normandy.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Now
programme.desc: In the third of the `Look Whos Talking comedies, two dogs enter the Umbriacco household - and take an immediate dislike to each other. When Molly loses her job, husband James is forced to take on a demanding role as private airline pilot. The children miss him, so he buys a dog to cheer them up. However, when Jamess glamorous boss asks his family to look after her poodle, sparks fly between the dogs.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: The Money Pit
programme.desc: An up-and-coming entertainment lawyer Walter Fielding takes the big step with his girlfriend and purchases a fixer-upper for a `steal. As it turns out, the `steal is really a `rip-off and everything that can go wrong, does.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friends killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Mob Land
programme.desc: In a small town struggling with addiction, a local sheriff tries to maintain the peace when desperate family man Shelby robs a pill mill. The supposedly easy score takes a violent turn, alerting the New Orleans mafias revenge-seeking enforcer.

programme.title: Dorian Gray
programme.desc: When a naïve young Dorian arrives in Victorian London, he is swept into a social whirlwind by the charismatic Lord Wotton, who introduces Dorian to the pleasures of the city. Henrys friend Basil Hallward paints a portrait of Dorian to capture the full power of his youthful beauty. When the portrait is unveiled, Dorian makes a flippant pledge: he would give anything to stay as he is in the picture - even his soul.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: When a new student joins her colleges female a cappella group, she takes the women out of their comfort zone of traditional pieces and introduces them to innovative arrangements.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3

programme.desc: Police launch a clever operation to catch criminals whove stashed stolen goods in a wood, and a laundress takes a thief to the cleaners.

programme.desc: The team continue to investigate the murder of an officer who was about to blow the whistle on police misconduct; Pride must get creative in order to finally get rid of the dirty cops; the mayor asks Pride to join her new task force.

programme.desc: The team investigates a suspicious death and the missing key piece of evidence is a top secret, high-tech battery; Pride and the team realise there could be deadly consequences if it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: The Living Beach
programme.desc: Just beyond Australias Queensland State is Fraser Island, a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand. In the middle of its rainforests, eucalyptus woodlands and mangrove forests, a visitor to Fraser Island is always standing upon the living beach.

programme.title: Monkey Island
programme.desc: Not everyone in Sri Lankas monkey paradise is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder, and with a newborn baby life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region and tensions boil over, can she do enough to keep her son alive?

programme.title: Monkey Island
programme.desc: An ancient citadel once home to Sri Lankas kings has now been reclaimed by the jungle and there is a new dynasty in power.

programme.title: Monkey Island
programme.desc: Tufted grey langurs share their territory with a troop of toque macaques and a group of purple face leaf monkeys. This is primate paradise. But a crippling drought changes everything. The three species are forced to adapt and take risks.

programme.title: Nature
programme.desc: Two families explore the evolutionary journey of woodpeckers and the role they play in each ecosystem that they inhabit.

programme.title: Africas Hunters

programme.title: Coral City
programme.desc: Feel the heat of summers arrival as supersize sea snails try to fend off an invading gang of coral-hungry starfish. Accompany reef sharks as they prowl for a midnight meal and marvel at the slippery disguise a parrotfish uses to survive the night.

programme.desc: In his mid-eighties, David Attenborough embarked on a seven-year journey. From the depths of the Great Barrier Reef to the ancient rainforests of Borneo, following his adventure across the globe.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Global Adventure: Home Planet
programme.desc: In his eighties, David Attenborough embarked on a seven-year journey. From the stunning Great Barrier Reef to the rainforests of Borneo, follow his voyage across the globe.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Global Adventure: The Rise of Nature
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores the rise of life on our planet, from the explosion of first life on seabeds hundreds of millions of years ago to life today.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Massive elephant seals go nose to nose to win the title of beachmaster, and giant petrels earn the nickname, murderous garbage men. Meanwhile, a female humpback goes to extremes to protect her calf from amorous males.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Canada, where summer is short and time is tight, any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Attack and Defend
programme.desc: In order to avoid predators, animals are bound to apply mimicry, poison and other methods to save themselves from danger.

programme.title: Attack and Defend
programme.desc: In their struggle for survival, underwater creatures have evolved for various niches and environments and to adapt both defensive and offensive skills.

programme.desc: The medical team check on a turkey vulture with an injured shoulder. However, the team has a hard time getting him into the X-ray.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: A group of orphaned squirrel babies storm the Wildlife Centre. The vets take care of a young wounded vulture that may be kept in the observation all winter. The team tries to catch a rogue coyote.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. Theyve thus far made their way up Americas waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like its finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From Rattlesnakes to Cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are bring dealt with when it comes to conservation.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight, especially for researchers who know they are not supposed to be there. The southern flying squirrel are typically found along the shores of Lake Erie.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: Sometimes animals get a second chance. Such as the majestic elk, who went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and overaggressive hunting.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: The Southern Drylands is a journey into the most arid and extreme environments in the furthest reaches of southern Africa. Spectacular but treacherous places where almost no rain falls with incredibly resilient creatures.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: Etosha was once a great lake that dried up and now only fills with water seasonally during the summer rains. Once the Etosha pan is full of water, a myriad of water birds congregate in the shallow lake to breed, most notably Greater and lesser flamingos.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: The course of South Africas Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. Along the way a diverse range of habitats and the creatures they support, from the dry lands of the Richtersveld to the beauty of Augrabies, this is the story of the Linear Oasis. A look at how life is adapted to survive along its course and discover a rich world of plants and animals.

programme.desc: A vengeful antagonist calls upon an elderly Starfleet admiral, professing to need his help in negotiating the release of hostages.

programme.desc: Trip becomes pregnant with an alien baby after being dispatched to an alien ship where he has a close encounter with one of the ships engineers.

programme.desc: Jamie ends summer with crispy duck in a rich plum sauce and roast potatoes. Grilled peppers star in panzanella. Garden zucchini become Mediterranean rice. Sweet finale: sour cherry frangipane with crème fraîche.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Kirsten works from the home office, while Joel is a sales representative with a make-shift workspace in their bedroom. To help this couple, Brian and Sarah look to the backyard for space to retrofit an old shipping container into an office.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Nicole and Charles have 3 kids, and their neighborhood parties are getting too big for their front porch. So Brian and Sarah add more entertaining space in the backyard, plus a 4-season garage conversion with a nautical theme.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Miriam and Mark are busy parents to four kids under 10 years old. To help these hardworking parents unwind, Brian and Sarah build them a parents-only hideaway in their backyard.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Debbie, Kevin, and their three children are a newly-blended family. To bring this new family together, Brian and Sarah build an irresistible treehouse village in their backyard.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Lynna is a single mom with three teenage kids and the time has come for her to have the back garden of her dreams. Brian and Sarah deliver in spades, with a 3 season hang-out, lush new landscaping, and a beautiful greenhouse.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: H and her tenant Emma are bursting out of their 3-unit home. To help out both landlord and tenants, Brian and Sarah add storage space, plus a common lounge space in the backyard, with some urban inspired design touches.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Crispy Pork Noodles and Cheesy Chard Cannelloni
programme.desc: Jamie celebrates rhubarb in a lip-smacking sauce, heroes spinach in a silky goats cheese risotto and marries vibrant basil with chard in a crowd-pleasing cheesy spring cannelloni.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Spring Onion Chicken Curry and Sausage Broccoli Pizza
programme.desc: Jamie elevates asparagus spears for a fishy feat, makes spring onions the star of the show in his spicy green chicken curry and gives purple sprouting broccoli an Italian-inspired makeover.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Stuffed Salmon Celebration and Almond Custard Tart
programme.desc: Jamie snazzes up some spuds with wild garlic pesto, creates a broad bean mezze, rustles up a beautiful spring salad and honours rhubarb in a luscious custard tart with almond brittle.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Summer-y Sweet Pea Risotto and Slow Roasted Pork
programme.desc: Jamie celebrates summer with roasted fennel pork and gratin, oozy pea risotto, and rainbow slaw chicken wraps. He shares edible hanging basket tips. The feast finishes with stunning mackerel on sun-dried tomato couscous with colorful beets.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Buddys Strawberry Rice Pudding and Summer Tomato Chicken Bake
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a chicken sheet pan dinner with early tomatoes, potatoes and chorizo. Buddy helps pick strawberries for quick jam rice pudding. The summer feast ends with spicy shrimp skewers with homegrown chillies and a refreshing cucumber gazpacho.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Summer is coming to a close but theres still a bounty of fresh, seasonal produce to enjoy. Celebrate with Frankie as he makes some of his favorite cookout classics thatll take you from a weekend picnic to a backyard BBQ, with or without a grill.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Frankie is all about BYOL - bring your own lunch. Its not only good for your wallet, its good for your health. Skip the vending machine and the cafeteria in favor of creative, cost effective and easy-to-transport midday meals.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Amp up your salad game with a little mixing and matching, from light and leafy greens to crisp and hearty toppings, and dressings for all occasions. Frankie shows us how versatile and fulfilling a homemade salad can truly be.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.sub-title: How Do You Like Them Apples
programme.desc: Apples arent just good for keeping the doctor away. Frankie demonstrates how to make the most of this beloved, everyday fruit, from sweet treats to savory meals. Theres a whole world of apples to dive into, especially while theyre in season.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of squash: theyre affordable, abundant and they come in all shapes, sizes, colors, and textures. Frankie spotlights squash from summer through winter highlighting their amazing superhero traits.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: No matter who youre rooting for, savor these ballpark favorites while beating those major league prices.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Frankie harnesses the power of time to transform simple ingredients into flavorful goods thatll stick around for a long time. Learn the basics of preserving, pickling and curing to make dinner anything but a struggle. It just takes a little patience.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Its no secret that pasta is Frankies favorite; hes serving it up all night without even opening his fridge.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Frankies slicing, mashing and smashing his way through the spud species, a staple for any Struggle kitchen.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Frankie teaches several methods for cooking eggs; the scramble, the omelet, and the Benedict; learn to make them just the way one likes them.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Ribs are a lifestyle, and Chef Dales living it up with smoky beef shorties in tangy red wine glaze, Miami-style pork ribs dripping in bacon-guava BBQ, spicy baked beans, and killer key lime caramel cones. Grab some napkins!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale is flipping burgers into art - gooey mac and cheese burgers, fancy French patties topped with melty bucheron cheese, crispy parm-truffle fries, and peanut butter fudge ice cream sandwiches. Get hungry.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Dales turning up the heat! Carolina Reaper wings hotter than your ex, sweet-chili NY strip steak, smoky grilled chipotle Texas toast, and ancho-gochujang pineapple skillet cake for dessert. Bring some water!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Dale fires up the tandoor grill, turning out juicy chicken thighs, smoky shrimp with Old Bay yogurt, crispy cauliflower, and a silky mango lassi dessert topped with crunchy candied pistachios. Tandoori done right!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Dale skewers ribeye, salmon, smoky eggplant dip, and grilled peaches. Food on sticks never tasted better!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Taco night, Dale-style! Puffy al pastor tacos stuffed with pineapple-chile pork, grilled chicken pepian with charred tomato sauce, crispy street corn ribs, and dulce de leche empanadas. Taco Tuesday who?

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Dale reinvents pizza night: grilled pizza bagels loaded with pepperoni, mozzarella-stuffed penne vodka pie, a massive grilled chop salad, and olive oil cake with burnt orange caramel. Pizza goals achieved.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Thanksgiving goes to the grill with Chef Dale-juicy spatchcock turkey, grilled sage-cornbread stuffing, smoked green bean casserole, and pumpkin donut bread pudding drenched in bourbon brown butter sauce.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Comforting and familiar but full of island flavor, right from the grill! Chef Dale roasts pork shoulder with chicharrones, steamy coconut rice and pigeon peas finished with frozen coconut rum drank with a charred banana.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: Wok Cooking On A Charcoal Grill
programme.desc: Anything is possible with a wok and a good ol charcoal grill, at least if youre Chef Dale, who throws together a heavenly spread of fiery eats, from drunken meats, stir fried veggies, and stir fried noodles.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: Grilled Loco Moco and Huli Huli Chicken
programme.desc: The options are plentiful when Chef Dale smothers grilled Loco Moco with a mushroom gravy, salty and sweet Huli Huli Chicken with charred pineapple, and healthy scoops of Tuna Water Chestnut poke or mac salad.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Summertime seasonal fruit pampers your tastebuds. Chef Dale grills blistered grapes with ham wrapped Trout, Peaches with smoked Pork Chops, Watermelon with halloumi, and Chargrilled Cherries with chocolate Mousse.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Wild Boar Feast: Chorizo with Mussels and Whole Roasted Leg
programme.desc: Wild boar takes center stage! Andrew makes chorizo with mussels, preserved lemon and white wine. Then, he slow-roasts a whole leg over fire, served Southern-style with pickled cherries, glazed onions and mustard sauce.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Southern Shrimp Skewers and Asian Crispy Rice
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern grills beloved shrimp in two distinct ways. He starts with jumbo shrimp and country ham skewers glazed with sweet-hot pepper jelly. Then, he creates Asian-inspired shrimp, served over crispy battle rice and a complex sambal.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Elk Tenderloin Tostadas and Grilled Rack of Ribs
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern highlights lean elk, first crafting classic Mexican tostadas with grilled tenderloin, avocado, and homemade salsa macha. Then, he grills a whole rack of elk, serving it with creamy colcannon, tarragon emulsion, and rosemary charcoal.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Grilled Clams Casino and Garlicky Clam Pizza
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern celebrates cherrystone clams with two show-stopping recipes. He prepares classic grilled clams casino with pancetta, then pushes boundaries with an innovative grilled pizza topped with clams, garlic, chiles, and cheese.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern explores Minnesotas forests for wild mushrooms. He creates a simple grilled mushroom salad, then hand-shapes cavatelli pasta tossed with golden chanterelles, butter, garlic, thyme, and colatura. He shares foraging and cleaning tips.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern showcases quail two ways: classic Southern fried quail with lemon-basil aioli, and as an elevated topping for a traditional open-fire paella, complete with crispy socarrat. He proves this small bird makes an extraordinary dinner.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Mediterranean Grilled Filets and Salt Crusted Halibut
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern elevates California halibut, first with grilled fillets on saffron labneh with romesco and roasted cabbage. Then, he demonstrates a classic salt-crusted whole halibut, served with whole roasted cauliflower and a rich cream sauce.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Venison Paillard and Hearty Hunters Stew
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern showcases venison two ways: a delicate grilled paillard with artichokes and parmesan, and a rich, slow-braised Polish hunters stew with kielbasa, mushrooms, and sauerkraut. Served with grilled leeks and coal-roasted potatoes.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Poultry Perfection: Moroccan Spiced Guinea Hen with Charred Vegetables
programme.desc: Andrew unlocks the rich flavor of guinea hen with a vibrant grilled salad featuring watercress and a mustard-hazelnut vinaigrette. Then, he slow-roasts a whole bird with Middle Eastern spices, served with harissa squash and eggplant-tahini puree.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Grilled Squid Salad and Crispy Squid on the Plancha
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern creates a vibrant salad where grilled squid is served with shaved fennel, cherry tomatoes, endive, and a lemon dressing. Then, Andrew shares his country-style squid on the plancha with fresh breadcrumbs, chilies, and a homemade aioli.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern shares his favorite way to prepare wild turkey breast, pan-fried over an open fire. Served with cheese sauce and jalapeno-bacon wild rice. Then, cooks a simple meal of seared salmon and a side of crispy potatoes and onions.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Zimmern cooks his version of Peking-style goose. Next, Chef Zimmern cooks a meal of striped bass.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Secret to Texas-Style Smoked Brisket
programme.desc: Pat and his buddy Leonard Botello use the flavors of the beloved native Post Oak to smoke a perfect Central Texas-style beef brisket.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Legend of Louis Muellers Dino Beef Ribs
programme.desc: Pat visits his close friend Wayne Mueller, third-generation pitmaster of Louis Muellers BBQ, to learn the ins and outs of his famous dino beef ribs.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin travels to a picturesque cattle farm in Californias Santa Maria Valley, to hear firsthand from a young pitmaster who has uncovered the secrets of real Santa Maria barbecue.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire

programme.desc: Pat Martin travels to Decatur, Alabama to visit a storied institution of barbecue - Big Bob Gibsons. There, he learns the ins, the outs, and the history of a regional delicacy: pit-cooked chicken with Alabama white sauce.

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off
programme.desc: On the final leg of their road trip, Ed Baines and Valentine Warner arrive in Nidderdale in North Yorkshire and they both hope to win the day - and the week - with their date and walnut scone entries at the Nidderdale Show. programme.title: Gavin and Stacey

programme.desc: Newly promoted Sergeant Jo Masters and PC Leon Taylor are called to an aggravated burglary which has left the homeowner, John Baker, dead. programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: When a letter bomb is delivered to the offices of a high profile company, the manager believes it to be a hoax, but Grace is concerned that it is the beginning of something sinister. programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Sgt Stone and PC Leon Taylor find themselves involved in an armed siege after Alan Wilcock reports that his mentally unbalanced ex-wife Carly has locked herself in his house with their young son. When she discharges a firearm, CO19 are called in to diffuse the situation, and Sgt Jo Masters quickly establishes a rapport with the aggrieved woman through an internet link, but she becomes increasingly hysterical as time goes by.

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Sgt Callum Stone is on his way home from a night out when he sees couple Clarinda Blake and Tim Hardacre arguing in an alley. When Tim starts to hit Clarinda, Callum goes to her defence but gets a severe beating in return. Clarinda is traced and questioned but insists she was the victim of a random mugging. It emerges that Clarindas teenage son Andy had been dealing weed for Tim and when Clarinda found out, she confronted him.

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Sgt Callum Stone and Sgt Jo Masters respond to a call to deal with a fracas outside a nightclub. programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: Some animals can do the seemingly impossible. Salamanders can regenerate entire legs and tails to replace ones theyve lost, while deer shed their massive antlers and regrow them from a few remaining cells each year. How do these animals regenerate entire body parts and why is it not possible for all animals to do the same?

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: A look at bizarre hybrids within the animal kingdom, including the pizzly bear which is a cross between a polar bear and a grizzly, which has come into existence because of global warming.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: Some animals can do the seemingly impossible. Salamanders can regenerate entire legs and tails to replace ones theyve lost, while deer shed their massive antlers and regrow them from a few remaining cells each year. How do these animals regenerate entire body parts and why is it not possible for all animals to do the same?

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: A look at bizarre hybrids within the animal kingdom, including the pizzly bear which is a cross between a polar bear and a grizzly, which has come into existence because of global warming.

programme.desc: Some animals have an incredible ability to get directions, including the dung beetle, which uses the sun, the moon and even the Milky Way to move its ball of dung in the right direction.

programme.title: Africa from Above
programme.desc: Explores the rich human and natural environments of South Africa, including visits to the countrys diverse coasts, sprawling urban settlements, huge railways, and even its extreme sport enthusiasts.

programme.title: Africa from Above

programme.title: Africa from Above
programme.desc: Explores Ghanas many natural and man-made wonders. Follows the Volta River as it flows from the Sahel savannahs, through fertile cocoa-laden hills at the heart of the nation, and across the biggest artificial lake in Africa.

programme.title: Africa from Above
programme.desc: Travels Ethiopia, the most populous landlocked country on Earth, to view its many sights. Highlights the work of communities that are planting trees to fight desertification and also visits Lake Tana, the countrys largest lake.

programme.title: Africa from Above
programme.desc: A journey of discovery around Uganda, the `Pearl of Africa, that highlights the countrys rich diversity in natural landscapes including glacier-tipped mountains, ancient rainforests and crater lakes.

programme.desc: An aerial journey through Morocco, the gateway to Africa. Visits areas including the countrys Mediterranean coastline, mighty Atlas Mountains and seemingly endless expanse of Sahara Desert.

programme.desc: A sun-bleached red Vauxhall Astra GTE gives the team a headache. They also buy a classic French moped and catch up on the restoration of a barn find Mini Cooper S.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team gamble on restoring a Vanden Plas saloon from the 1970s and a childs tricycle from the 1960s. Plus, catch up on the restoration of a rare Sunbeam Lotus.

programme.title: Interior Design Masters
programme.desc: Eight designers remain to battle it out to win the life-changing design contract at one of the UKs top hotels. Arriving at Michelles Brighton studio, the contestants discover that this weeks task is an unusual brief. Gordano School in Bristol has four tired common rooms that need some love and attention. Working in teams of two, the designers must spruce up the common rooms and an adjoining office. The two weakest designers will be sent home, upping the stakes in this third challenge.

programme.title: First Responders

programme.title: First Responders

programme.title: Interior Design Masters

But before they hit the high street, they must first meet their clients and take it in turns to pitch their design ideas.

programme.title: The Blue Planet

programme.title: The Blue Planet
